physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of male soldiers. One of them is standing on a stack of fences. Another soldier is holding a pile of uniforms with his left hand, at the right hand side of the photograph. At the left hand side of the photograph, a soldier wearing a cap looks in the direction where the photograph was captured.
title_text: Japanese POWs having finished their work Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Prisoner of war Japan. Rikugun
